item.title: What is DAO
item.description: What is DAO? DAO - Decentralized Autonomous Organization is an organization operating in accordance with the rules encoded as a computer program also known as a smart contract (smart contract). Think of it as a kind of company, registerd on blockchain that is run by smart contracts. What is a smart contract? This is a self-executing contract where the terms between buyer and seller are written directly into the lines of code.
